subject: Organized Labor
Football
Social Networking (Internet)
lead_paragraph: With the current labor agreement between the league and the players union expiring March 3, the two sides are jabbing, countering and needling each other on Twitter, Facebook and on Web sites devoted entirely to the possible lockout.
snippet: With the current labor agreement between the league and the players union expiring March 3, the two sides are jabbing, countering and needling each other on Twitter, Facebook and on Web sites devoted entirely to the possible lockout.
